Just on a quick glance, Break the block of text for similar shows into a column below the show picture and include the show images in a list, almost like facebook's recommended friends. The long ass list of unlinked episodes doesn't really provide any value imo. I'd also include large across the top of a show page relevant information about now. When is the next episode? what was the last episode? Status of the series? etc
